He has done stellar work for the company and I will work to ensure a smooth transition with the Windows Azure team, said Steve Ballmer . I stand by what I've said about those events, but when the spokesman needs a spokesman, it's time to move on. Translation from the original British: I didn't do anything wrong, it's those pesky reporters! For Philadelphia To Use On Michael Vick Franchise Tag Likely To Be Available For Philadelphia To Use On Michael Vick Philadelphia Inquirer- The Eagles should be free to use their franchise tag on Michael Vick , despite labor uncertainty. I expect the franchise tag to continue to operate as it has in prior seasons and clubs to be permitted to exercise their rights under the tag, Jeff Pash , the NFL's general counsel, said Thursday. The Eagles and Michael Vick have had casual discussions about such a deal, a source close to the situation said.
